programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The almost never-ending paradise of one of New Zealand's most breathtaking beaches.

programme.title: Muriwai Beach: New Zealand - Muriwai Beach: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, The coast of Muriwai Beach with tides and rushing currents.

programme.title: Good Morning - Pa'ako Beach, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A new day dawns on Hawaii's Pa'ako beach.

programme.title: Natural Beauty - Kahakuloa Bay, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Highlights of some of the world's most exotic locations.

programme.title: Superbloom Soaring - Superbloom Soaring
programme.desc: Season 1, A gentle flight over the spring poppy fields of California's Antelope Valley and Lake Elsinore wilderness, filmed in 2020 and 2019.

programme.title: Wharariki Beach II: New Zealand - Wharariki Beach II: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Featuring a rugged coastline, especially at low tide, which opens up vast sandy beaches.

programme.title: Coastal Spring Flowers - Big Sur, California
programme.desc: Season 1, Nature scenes from California's coast.

programme.title: Bryce Canyon Relaxation - Bryce Canyon Relaxation
programme.desc: Season 1, Admiring the wonders of one of the world's most breathtaking natural destinations: Bryce Canyon, in Utah.

programme.title: Hawaii Sunrise Waves - Hawaii Sunrise Waves
programme.desc: Season 1, Filmed along the eastern shores of Oahu, Hawaii; waves crash and glisten as the golden sun casts its warming rays.

programme.title: Karamea National Park: New Zealand - Karamea National Park: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Quiet beaches, mysterious caves, and rainforested hills of this secluded haven.

programme.title: North Island's Waterfalls II: New Zealand - North Island's Waterfalls II: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Marvelling at nature's unyielding force with North Island's many waterfalls; multiple streams glide with quiet ease or cascading waters rushing with high intensity, all surrounded by New Zealand's lush and magical greenery.

programme.title: Pukaki & Ohau Lake: New Zealand - Pukaki & Ohau Lake: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Snow-capped mountains in calm water, and rugged coastlines of New Zealand.

programme.title: Rustic Fireplace: Laurentians - Rustic Fireplace: Laurentians
programme.desc: Season 1, Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Rustic Fireplace: Laurentians - Rustic Fireplace: Laurentians
programme.desc: Season 1, Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Its Raining Mannequins
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 45 Dead women and mutilated mannequins pop up in a Texas town. And it will take a broken window, a pizza box, and a few stray hairs to track down a homicidal postman.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Skeleton in the Closet
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 A man is murdered by his cheating wife's lover, who had been living in their closet.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Forsaken
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 29 Using state-of-the-art forensics, police identify the body as that of a suburban wife and mother of two. Determined to find the killer, police dig further into the victim’s life, doggedly tracking down a former lover in New York City.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - The Smiley Face Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 30 One by one, prostitutes in Spokane, Washington, are being hunted down and discarded in remote wooded areas by a vicious serial killer. On each victim’s head, police find his macabre calling card – a plastic bag emblazoned with an ironic Smiley Face.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 3
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 An afternoon drinker has his bell rung by an angry man in crutches, bodycam cops resort to desperate measures to prevent a tragedy, and a young man collapses among some late night trouble.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 4
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 The bodycam squad hunts for a burglar and are given the run around, a break in at a hotel unearths a mystery, and the cops are left tongue tied over the alleged theft of a bag.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Stefano Brizzi
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 For one week in 2016, Stefano Brizzi stored the body of a policeman in his flat in central London. Taking inspiration from the TV show Breaking Bad, he tried to dissolve the body in his bath tub.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Roy Whiting
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 On July 1st, 2000, eight-year-old Sarah Payne was snatched from the street in Littlehampton, West Sussex. She had been abducted and murdered by convicted paedophile Roy Whiting.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Tracie Andrews
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 On December 1st, 1996, Tracie Andrews had stabbed her own fiancé Lee Harvey to death and was trying to get away with murder.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Dorothea Puente
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 In 1988, Puente had drugged and killed her victims so she could continue to fraudulently claim their social security benefits.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Beverly Ann Dyke
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 214 Police investigated a brutal and senseless murder, and false claims of guilt nearly derailed the investigation but the victim’s family never gave up trying to find the truth and uncover the killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Veiled Killer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 215 The inquiry into the death of David Castor and how an extensive police investigation, fueled with the power of forensics, uncovered another victim and brought the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Whelan Family Murders
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 216 Sharon Whelan and her daughters were attacked and killed in their home on Christmas Eve. A multi-discipline forensics investigation uncovered the killer’s horrific actions and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Imette St. Guillen
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 217 The events leading up to a horrific murder, the large-scale police investigation that identified the killer and how the powerful strands of forensics were able to link the killer to other victims.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 When an expectant mother is found murdered, online clues lead police to every patient's worst nightmare: a doctor who uses his skills to kill rather than cure.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Face of the Enemy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 14 Forced to impersonate a Romulan Intelligence official, Counselor Troi becomes a pivotal part of an elaborate defection scheme.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Tapestry
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 After Picard loses his life in a surprise attack, Q gives him the chance to change his destiny.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Birthright (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 Worf and Data embark on unusual journeys to seek out their fathers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Birthright (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 In seeking his father, Worf discovers a prisoner-of-war camp that has evolved into a Klingon/Romulan haven - an Eden where Worf becomes their serpent.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Starship Mine
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 While the Enterprise is bombarded with lethal rays, Picard is trapped on board with a band of interstellar thieves.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Lessons
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 19 Picard is torn between love and duty when he is forced to send the woman he loves on a potentially deadly mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Chase
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 Picard finds himself in a race with Cardassians, Klingons, and Romulans to solve a four billion-year-old genetic puzzle.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Frame of Mind
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 21 Trapped in an alien mental hospital, with little memory of the past, Riker is convinced he is going insane.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suspicions
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 A pioneering Ferengi scientist Is found dead, and Beverly risks her career to prove he was murdered.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Rightful Heir
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 Worf finds his faith sorely tested when it appears that the greatest Klingon warrior of all time has returned from the dead to reclaim the empire.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Second Chances
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 Riker's exact duplicate is discovered on Nervala IV. His first order of business: resume his relationship with Deanna. Second order: obey orders from his superior - himself.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Timescape
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 25 Aboard a shuttlecraft and en route back to the Enterprise, Picard, LaForge, Data, and Troi find themselves trapped in a time trap of some sort, where the Enterprise is being taken over by Romulans, and the ship, itself, on a course of destruction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Descent - Part 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 When the Borg return to do battle with the Federation, they boast a new individuality - and tempt Data when they help him feel his first emotion.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Descent (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 Picard, Troi, and Geordi are held prisoner by Data, who has left the Enterprise to join his evil brother Lore as leaders of the Borg.

programme.title: Chris Claremont's X-Men - Chris Claremont's X-Men
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Chris Claremont came to Marvel as a young man, and was assigned a book that no one else wanted, a book on the brink of cancellation: X-Men.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - The Lady and the Tiger
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 A day at the circus reunites MacLeod with a former lover, the Immortal femme fatale, Amanda, who has always meant big trouble for him.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 Richie becomes involved with a woman who is a model for another Immortal, Gabriel Piton, who is an old friend of Duncan's.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Avenging Angel
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 A deluded new Immortal believes that he has been chosen by God to crusade against evil, and one of his target's is an old friend of Tessa's.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The After Hours
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 34 A woman discovers that the floor of a department store, on which she bought a gold thimble, doesn't exist - and that her 'saleslady' is really a mannequin!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Mighty Casey
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 35 A scientist arranges to have his human-looking robot pitch for the struggling local baseball team.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A World of His Own
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 36 A playwright makes characters come to life.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - King Nine Will Not Return
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 A pilot of a downed WW II bomber comes to in the African desert and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Man in the Bottle
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 A luckless couple stumbles upon fortune when a genie materializes from a bottle in their antique shop. The genie grants them four wishes but warns them, prophetically, to be careful what you wish for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 Small time criminal Jackie Rhoades must face both his past and his conscience while waiting for his next assignment.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Thing About Machines
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Bartlett Finchley's paranoia about the machines around proves true.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Howling Man
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Seeking refuge from a storm, traveler David Ellington comes upon a bizarre hermitage of monks, who have imprisoned a man who begs for his help. When David confronts the head monk Brother Jerome, he is told that the man is the devil, and David must decide

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E7 - John Quixote
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 Crichton and Chiana get stuck in a video game where they encounter strange/twisted versions of their friends.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E8 - I Shrink Therefore I Am
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 8 When Moya is raided by bounty hunters working for the Peacekeepers, every crew member is captured except for Crichton and Noranti.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nick of Time
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune-telling machine in a local diner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Lateness of the Hour
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Trouble with Templeton
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Most Unusual Camera
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Night of the Meek
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a mysterious bag that gives out presents. With this bag, he sets out to fulfill his one wish - to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Dust
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.

programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 The best of the worst for May 2020.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Year Of Hell, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 A badly damaged Voyager with a skeleton crew leads an armada of interplanetary ships against them.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Random Thoughts
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A telepathic race arrests Torres for thinking violent thoughts.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Concerning Flight
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 While searching for equipment stolen from Voyager, Janeway gets help from her holodeck mentor, Leonardo da Vinci.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Mortal Coil
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 12 When Neelix dies and is brought back to life, he begins to doubt his spiritual beliefs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Waking Moment's
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 Nightmares become reality when the crew is attacked in their dreams.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Message In A Bottle
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 The Voyager crew makes contact with a Starfleet ship in the Alpha Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Hunters
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new message from Starfleet brings the crew letters from home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prey
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 Voyager is caught in the middle of a deadly game between hunter and prey.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Retrospect
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 Exploration into Seven of Nine's repressed memories results in tragedy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Killing Game, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 18 An enemy attack leaves Janeway and the crew believing they are characters in a World War II holodeck simulation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Killing Game, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 19 World War II happens all over again as a holodeck simulation spills out onto the decks of Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Vis A Vis
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 When the Voyager stops to help an alien repair his ship, the alien switches bodies with Paris.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Omega Directive
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 21 Voyager comes across a space phenomenon that must be destroyed at all costs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unforgettable
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 22 Chakotay meets a woman he once loved, but he has no memory of her.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 22
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 This episode includes: Boston Strangler (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD, Secret Hiding Place & UD and Wrong Place, Wrong Time.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 This episode includes: Sonny Liston, Update: Locust Grove, Sharon's Search and Campbell Kidnapping.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 3

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 This episode includes: Money Clip Murder & UD, Update: Unknown Arsonist, Louisiana Burning, Epilepsy Pooches and Cowboy Bandit.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 15
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 This episode includes: Wheat Fields, Hit and Run, Update: Sharon's Search and Novel Disappearance.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 This episode includes: Kecksburg UFO (Pts. 1 & 2), Update: Pizza Man & 3rd Anniversary Reunion, Unknown Arsonist & UD and Hospital Babynap.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 3
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 This episode includes: Ladies Man & UD, Dr. Rapist & UD, Interstate Disappearance & UD and One Minute Million.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 This episode includes Queen Mary Ghost Ship, Update: Carlucci, Two Strikes & UD, and Personals Pts. 1 & 2 & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 This episode includes: Platinum Pilfer, Update: Orphan Train, Ghost Lights, Greeting Card and Caruana.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 12
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 12 This episode includes: Suspect Turned Victim & UD, David Lee Kemp & UD, Internet Abduction & UD and Love is Blind.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 5 This episode includes: Mexico UFO, Slain Sammy, Pts. 1 & 2 & UD and Missing Rainman.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: MST3K: I Accuse My Parents - MST3K: I Accuse My Parents
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young man gets mixed up with a crime syndicate and blames his inattentive parents. The 1940s-era documentary short explains the then-new techniques that enabled farmers to rush produce to market.

programme.title: Laserblast - Laser Blast
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A teenager discovers a laser weapon left behind by turtle-like aliens. He uses it for petty revenge, but the weapon slowly changes his personality.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Sport Parade: Snow Thrills
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 A classic newsreel that highlights various winter sports.

programme.title: MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians - MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

programme.title: MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II - MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

programme.title: MST3K: The Amazing Transparent Man - MST3K: The Amazing Transparent Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 During the feature film The Amazing Transparent Man (1960), a mad scientist makes an escaped criminal invisible so he can steal radioactive supplies.

programme.title: MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die - MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

programme.title: MST3K: The Dead Talk Back - MST3K: The Dead Talk Back
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Metaphysics helps to solve a murder case while Mike and the Bots impersonate the Grateful Dead.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: MST3K: The Creeping Terror - MST3K: The Creeping Terror
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the 'bots watch The Creeping Terror (1964), with its infamous walking-carpet monster, and parody Love, American Style (1969).

programme.title: The Magic of Ordinary Days - The Magic of Ordinary Days
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

programme.title: A Painted House - A Painted House
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper - My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

programme.title: Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith - Mitch Albom's Have a Little Faith
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The story follows the spiritual journeys of three men: a suburban rabbi, an inner-city pastor, and an author. Stars Bradley Whitford, Laurence Fishburne, and Martin Landau. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Decoration Day - Decoration Day
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A grumpy man must rejoin his community when his godchild gets in trouble and a childhood friend refuses to accept a Congressional Medal of Honor for bravery in World War II. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Missing Pieces - Missing Pieces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Notes From the Heart Healer - Notes From the Heart Healer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When recently married Peyton finds herself a caregiver to an abandoned baby, it awakens a desire in her to be a mother. Husband King, however, is not so sure about starting a new family. The third installment The Note.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Hot Zone
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 A team of scientists is surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Sanctuary
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Brotherhood
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan, where the Sudarians were trusted with the module over 10,000 years ago. In their search, the team begins to worry about their new allies and their motives.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Life
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Using the communications stones, Lt. Scott and Camile Wray use their time back on Earth to visit those they’ve left behind. Aboard Destiny, the crew stumbles upon a piece of Ancient technology that carries the promise of a way home.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Justice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Everyone is shocked when a member of the crew is found dead from a gunshot wound. While it appears to be suicide, the gun is nowhere to be found…until it shows up in Col. Young’s (Louis Ferreira) quarters and he becomes the number one suspect.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Space
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Divided
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Children Of The Gods (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 As Colonel Jack O'Neill and his team journey to Abydos to confront deadly warriors and laser-firing Death Gliders, O'Neill realizes that this new mission seems hauntingly familiar and that an old enemy has returned to take his revenge on Earth.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 In this suspenseful tale of survival of the fittest, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and the SG-1 team must attempt to remove a Goa'uld larva that has infected Kawalsky's (guest star Jay Acovone) brain … but time is running out!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Emancipation
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 On the planet Simarka, where the fierce race of Shavadai mistreat females, Capt. Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) challenges their ways in a thrilling battle of wits that may bring women equity or forever keep them as second-class citizens.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Broca Divide
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Returning from a planet with both a civilized and primitive side, all but two of the team become infected and spread a brutal virus. Will Teal'c and Jackson find the cause, or are their colleagues doomed to become Stone Age primitives?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The First Commandment
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 The SG-1 team is sent after the SG-9 team that has failed to return. They find that the team's captain (William Russ), having been treated like a god by planetary inhabitants, is drunk with power and is tyrannizing them. Can they overcome him?
